;;;37       #else

;;;48         {
;;;49         #endif
;;;50           U16 Char;

;;;52             Char = GUI_UC__GetCharCodeInc(&s);
;;;53             GUI_Context.pAFont->pfDispChar(Char);
;;;54             if (GUI_pfDispCharStyle) {

;;;59       #endif
